info.name: Google Apps Script Dark - Monokai
info.description: A dark theme for the Google Apps Script Editor!
info.additionalInfo:
v1.21 - current


Changes:
v1.0  -- initial theme release 
v1.1  -- fixed debugger styling
v1.2  -- added styling for modals (logger, text search/replace) 
           changed logger font to monospace font (Consolas)
v1.21 -- updated url selector
